Package hac.ex4.controllers

Class BookController

java.lang.Object
hac.ex4.controllers.BookController
@Controller public class BookController extends Object
Controller that handle all store (user pages, not including the purchase)

    • searchGET

      @GetMapping("/search") public String searchGET(@ModelAttribute("searchInput") String searchInput, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Implementation of GET request (see the POST route that correspond).
      Parameters:
      searchInput - - The substring to search.
      model - - The model for view.
      Returns:
      - Main store page with the books that fits the research.

    • searchPOST

      @PostMapping("/search") public String searchPOST(@ModelAttribute("searchInput") String searchInput, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Get a POST request including a substring of name of book to search in the database and return all book that their name contains this substring.
      Parameters:
      searchInput - - The substring.
      model - - The model for view.
      Returns:
      - Main store page with the books that fits the research.

    • addToBasketPOST

      @PostMapping("/add-to-basket") public String addToBasketPOST(@RequestParam("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Get a POST req to add a book into the basket.
      Parameters:
      id - - The id of the book to add (if exist already in the list - increase the quantity of the book).
      model - - The model for view.
      Returns:
      - Main store page.

    • plusToBasketPOST

      @PostMapping("/plus-to-basket-same-item") public String plusToBasketPOST(@RequestParam("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Get a POST req to increase a book existing in the basket.
      Parameters:
      id - - The id of the book to increase.
      model - - The model for view.

    • decreaseItemFromBasketGET

      @GetMapping("/minus-to-basket-same-item/{id}") public String decreaseItemFromBasketGET(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Implementation of GET request (see the POST route that correspond).
      Parameters:
      id - - The id of the book to decrease.
      model - - The model for view.

      - Basket page.

    • decreaseItemFromBasketPOST

      @PostMapping("/minus-to-basket-same-item/{id}") public String decreaseItemFromBasketPOST(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Get a POST req to decrease a book existing in the basket.
      Parameters:
      id - - The id of the book to decrease (if reaches 0 quantity of same book in basket - remove book from the basket list).
      model - - The model for view.
      Returns:
      - Basket page.

      Parameters:
      id - - The id of the book.
      model - - The model for view.
      Returns:
      - Basket page.

      Get a POST req to delete a specific book existing in the basket.
      Parameters:
      id - - The id of the book.
